section.name: Usage
section.source: <t:panelNavigation2 [ standard HTML table attributes ] [itemClass="normal-menu-item-css-class"] [openItemClass="open-menu-item-css-class"] [activeItemClass="active-menu-item-css-class"] [separatorClass="separator-css-class"] [itemStyle="normal-menu-item-css-style"] [openItemStyle="open-menu-item-css-style"] [activeItemStyle="active-menu-item-css-style"] [separatorStyle="separator-css-style"]> Nested <t:commandNavigation2> tags (menu items) and output components <t:navigationMenuItem> tags (NavigationMenuItem) <t:navigationMenuItems> tags (NavigationMenuItem(s)) </t:panelNavigation>
